fields.description:
"Create new load balancer" step 2:  in the footnote we have "* Required fields" but "*" is not used to mark anything. The availability zone selection is required: the "next" button will not activate without it. Screenshot attached. 

expected behavior from comments below: EC2 classic: AZ field should be required, with one zone pre-populated for the user, regardless of zone count. 
VPC: subnet is required, with no subnet pre-populated for user.
fields.summary: "Select availability zones" field should be marked with an asterisk in "Create new load balancer" dialog

comments.body: Also pre-select a zone if there is only one choice to limit required user selections.

EC2 classic: AZ field should be required, with one zone pre-populated for the user, regardless of zone count. 
VPC: subnet is required, with no subnet pre-populated for user.

[~jloza], [~alice], can I confirm that in VPC, the security group is not required?
(btw, I disabled the requirement for sec group and was able to create ELB w/o one, and default was used (and shown in detail page afterwards))

We'd need some messaging around that, like a bubble help. Do you want to throw that in as part of this ticket? For VPC, display bubble help after security group label that says "If you do not select a security group, the default one will be used."

Another question as I recall an older conversation. I think that we either require zone *or* instances, but never both. Correct?
I notice that in the AWS console, It doesn't ask me to specify a zone. It only asks for instance and I specified none. It automatically assigned me to one of the zones in the region.
So, again, if we accept either zone or instances as input, then zone strictly isn't required. However API docs seem to indicate the call requires it. So, if we don't require for the user, perhaps we can choose a zone based on the instance(s) they selected? Would we set zone as required and just add zones as they select instances (which have a zone)? Maybe a live chat about this would be good.
bubble help done.
[~dkavanagh], our behavior w/r/t the way zones and instances interact is right, it took a ton of work to get it that way please be careful, thar be dragons!
https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1581
subnet is required.
OK, I was looking at "VPC network" on step2, not VPC Subnet on step3. I'll get that.
Since subnet is required, I should give it the same treatment as avail zone, right? (i.e. preselect)
done!
read issue description...

why wouldn't we re-populate like the zone?
are we more likely to make the wrong choice for the user?
yeah, probably so.
back to you!
subnet still prepopulating
UX review passed, ready for code review. Thanks, [~dkavanagh]
I'm making changes on this branch to fix GUI-2035. please hold off merging till then.
PR 1581 merged

Tested on Shared Setup #1

Creating a new LB, on Step #2 observe Add availability zones is marked with an "*"
Released in 4.2
